headline: Ask HN: Who are the most engaging writers / bloggers in (Dev/Ops/SEC) Tech?
description:
I feel like I may be behind the times or missing some of the better tweet thread writers as well since it's so noisy there.

Some of mine, for example: Jeff Atwood, Steve Yegge, Cindy Sridharan, Julia Evans, Kelsey Hightower, James Govenor, Charity Majors, Martin Fowler's blog...

Who else? Who's on the rise? Who should we follow?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 谁是（Dev/Ops/SEC）技术领域最吸引人的作家/博主？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 誰是（Dev/Ops/SEC）技術領域最吸引人的作家/博主？
description_zh-Hans:
我觉得我可能落后于时代，或者也错过了一些更好的推特线程作者，因为那里太嘈杂了。

例如，我的一些人。 Jeff Atwood, Steve Yegge, Cindy Sridharan, Julia Evans, Kelsey Hightower, James Govenor, Charity Majors, Martin Fowler的博客...

还有谁？谁在崛起？我们应该关注谁？
description_zh-Hant:
我覺得我可能落後於時代，或者也錯過了一些更好的推特線程作者，因為那裡太嘈雜了。

例如，我的一些人。 Jeff Atwood, Steve Yegge, Cindy Sridharan, Julia Evans, Kelsey Hightower, James Govenor, Charity Majors, Martin Fowler的博客...

還有誰？誰在崛起？我們應該關注誰？
